mapper.insert:
insert into tunesurge_users.ts_role(role_name, role_code, description, create_time, update_time, status) values
(#{entity.roleName}, #{entity.roleCode}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.status})

insert into tunesurge_users.ts_role(role_name, role_code, description, create_time, update_time, status) values
(#{entity.roleName}, #{entity.roleCode}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.status})
on duplicate key update role_name = values(role_name) , role_code = values(role_code) , description = values(description) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , status = values(status)
